languages.text: "Чем гуще мрак, тем ярче пламя в наших сердцах! Сплотимся перед ликом катастрофы!"
"The denser the darkness, the brighter the fire in our hearts! We must unite in the face of calamity!"
languages.original_text: "Чем гуще мрак, тем ярче пламя в наших сердцах! Сплотимся перед ликом катастрофы!"

traits.locale_text: "The denser the darkness, the brighter the fire in our hearts! We must unite in the face of calamity!"
"The denser the darkness, the brighter the fire in our hearts! We must unite in the face of calamity!"
"The denser the darkness, the brighter the fire in our hearts! We must unite in the face of calamity!"
"The denser the darkness, the brighter the fire in our hearts! We must unite in the face of calamity!"

languages.text: “黑暗越是浓厚，我们心中的火焰就越是明亮！在灾难面前，我们必须团结起来！”
languages.original_text: "The denser the darkness, the brighter the fire in our hearts! We must unite in the face of calamity!"

traits.locale_text: “黑暗越是浓厚，我们心中的火焰就越是明亮！在灾难面前，我们必须团结起来！”

languages.text: « Plus les ténèbres sont épaisses, plus le feu qui anime nos cœurs est intense ! Nous devons faire face à cette calamité ensemble ! »
languages.original_text: "The denser the darkness, the brighter the fire in our hearts! We must unite in the face of calamity!"

traits.locale_text: « Plus les ténèbres sont épaisses, plus le feu qui anime nos cœurs est intense ! Nous devons faire face à cette calamité ensemble ! »

languages.text: "Je dichter die Dunkelheit, desto heller brennt das Feuer in unseren Herzen! Wir müssen uns im Angesicht der Katastrophe vereinen!"
languages.original_text: "The denser the darkness, the brighter the fire in our hearts! We must unite in the face of calamity!"

traits.locale_text: "Je dichter die Dunkelheit, desto heller brennt das Feuer in unseren Herzen! Wir müssen uns im Angesicht der Katastrophe vereinen!"

languages.text: 「闇が深いほど、私たちの心に燃える炎は明るくなる！厄災を前に団結しなくては！」
languages.original_text: "The denser the darkness, the brighter the fire in our hearts! We must unite in the face of calamity!"

traits.locale_text: 「闇が深いほど、私たちの心に燃える炎は明るくなる！厄災を前に団結しなくては！」

languages.text: «Cuanto más densa es la oscuridad, ¡más brilla el fuego de nuestros corazones! ¡Debemos unirnos ante el desastre!».
languages.original_text: "The denser the darkness, the brighter the fire in our hearts! We must unite in the face of calamity!"

traits.locale_text: «Cuanto más densa es la oscuridad, ¡más brilla el fuego de nuestros corazones! ¡Debemos unirnos ante el desastre!».

languages.original_text: "The denser the darkness, the brighter the fire in our hearts! We must unite in the face of calamity!"

languages.text: "Karanlık yoğunlaştıkça kalbimdeki ateş daha da ışıldayacak! Felaket karşısında birlik olmalıyız!"
languages.original_text: "The denser the darkness, the brighter the fire in our hearts! We must unite in the face of calamity!"

traits.locale_text: "Karanlık yoğunlaştıkça kalbimdeki ateş daha da ışıldayacak! Felaket karşısında birlik olmalıyız!"
